SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,viewCount,regdate,isSecret,reservetype FROM board_cs
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1)
WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNum} AND rnum <= #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM board_cs
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,viewCount,isSecret,reservetype, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_cs) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
